languages.text: "Сержант... Сержанта мы вздернули. Его нам дали Арбитес, служители Расколотого Неба. А с Неба приходит только зло..." {n}Единственный глаз гвардейца внимательно изучает ваш отряд, словно прикидывая что-то.{/n}

"Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сержант... Сержанта мы вздернули. Его нам дали Арбитес, служители Расколотого Неба. А с Неба приходит только зло..." {n}Единственный глаз гвардейца внимательно изучает ваш отряд, словно прикидывая что-то.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites, who serve the Riven Sky, had given him to us. And nothing but evil comes from the Sky..." {n}The guardsman's only eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

"Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

languages.text: «Nuestro sargento... Lo colgamos. Nos lo dio el Arbites. Sirven al Cielo Desgarrado, y el Cielo solo nos trae la maldad...». {n}El único ojo del Guardia estudia a tu escuadrón con interés, como si calculara algo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro sargento... Lo colgamos. Nos lo dio el Arbites. Sirven al Cielo Desgarrado, y el Cielo solo nos trae la maldad...». {n}El único ojo del Guardia estudia a tu escuadrón con interés, como si calculara algo.{/n}

languages.text: “我们的军士……我们已经把他绞死了，因为他是法务部的喉舌。他们全都侍奉破碎之空，是彻头彻尾的邪恶之徒……”{n}眼前的帝国卫队士兵用独眼专注地打量着你的队伍，似乎在思考些什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们的军士……我们已经把他绞死了，因为他是法务部的喉舌。他们全都侍奉破碎之空，是彻头彻尾的邪恶之徒……”{n}眼前的帝国卫队士兵用独眼专注地打量着你的队伍，似乎在思考些什么。{/n}

languages.text: 「軍曹は…俺たちは軍曹を吊るした。裁定局は彼を俺たちにくれた。奴らは割れた空に仕えていて、空からは悪い物以外何も来ない…」{n}そのガーズマン片目は、何かを計算するように注意深くあなたの部隊を見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「軍曹は…俺たちは軍曹を吊るした。裁定局は彼を俺たちにくれた。奴らは割れた空に仕えていて、空からは悪い物以外何も来ない…」{n}そのガーズマン片目は、何かを計算するように注意深くあなたの部隊を見る。{/n}

languages.text: « Notre sergent... Nous l'avons pendu haut et court. C'était un sbire à la solde de l'Arbites. Or, ce dernier œuvre au service de la Fracture Céleste, et rien de bon ne vient jamais de la Fracture... » {n}De son œil valide, le garde examine attentivement votre escouade, comme s'il cherchait à tâter le terrain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Notre sergent... Nous l'avons pendu haut et court. C'était un sbire à la solde de l'Arbites. Or, ce dernier œuvre au service de la Fracture Céleste, et rien de bon ne vient jamais de la Fracture... » {n}De son œil valide, le garde examine attentivement votre escouade, comme s'il cherchait à tâter le terrain.{/n}

languages.text: "Çavuşumuz mu? Çavuşumuzu astık. Yargıcılar onu bize verdi. Çatlak Gök'e hizmet ediyorlar. Gök, şerden başka bir şey göndermez." {n}Muhafız, bir gözüyle bir şeyler hesaplıyormuşçasına yanındakileri süzüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çavuşumuz mu? Çavuşumuzu astık. Yargıcılar onu bize verdi. Çatlak Gök'e hizmet ediyorlar. Gök, şerden başka bir şey göndermez." {n}Muhafız, bir gözüyle bir şeyler hesaplıyormuşçasına yanındakileri süzüyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Unser Sergeant ... den haben wir aufgeknüpft. Die Arbites gaben ihn uns. Sie dienen dem Gespaltenen Himmel und vom Himmel kommt nichts als das Böse ..." {n}Der Gardist studiert deinen Trupp, als würde er etwas berechnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Our sergeant... We strung up our sergeant. The Arbites gave him to us. They serve the Riven Sky, and nothing comes from the Sky but evil..." {n}The Guardsman's one eye studies your squad intently, as if calculating something.{/n}
